Here are some captivating graphs I have made for my recent COVID-19 Research initiative with the National Chiao Tung University Team: 

## [Data Visualization in R](curve.html)

- An interactive graph displaying the COVID-19 State Cases/State Population curves in the United States. 
- Provides insights on how different political and governmental policies affect the COVID-19 tresnds in the US

## [Interactive US Map in R](senate_map_graph.html)

- Interactive US Map to look at the Cases/Death percentages of each State
- Provides insights on the correlation between COVID-19 statistics and State political affiliation
